alert.note: Alert for Antelope (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Antelope County through 730 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles south of Oakdale, or 7 miles southeast of Neligh, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Antelope County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
